text: The 1990 Vuelta a España was the 45th edition of the Vuelta a España, one of cycling's Grand Tours. The Vuelta began in Benicàssim, with an individual time trial on 24 April, and Stage 11 occurred on 4 May with a stage to . The race finished in Madrid on 15 May. ==Stage 1== 24 April 1990 — Benicàssim to Benicàssim, (ITT) {| |Stage 1 result and general classification after Stage 1 {| class="wikitable" |- ! scope="col" | Rank !
